short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly share or transfer ephemeral links between devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With one click, users can quickly generate a short url and QR code for their current active tab. efmrl links are automatically copied to the user's clipboard and expire after first use.

- 100% free.
- No sign up.
- No tracking.
- No special permissions.
